channel.title: Sanath Blogs - Data Science & AI Automation Insights
channel.description: Expert insights on Data Science, AI automation, and machine learning by Sanath Kumar. Discover practical guides and tutorials on automation workflows and data analysis.

item.title: Automation with n8n: A Comprehensive Guide
item.description: Learn how to automate your workflows using n8n, a powerful open-source automation tool. This comprehensive guide covers everything from basic setup to advanced automation techniques.
